headerText: The `v-window` component provides the baseline functionality for transitioning content from 1 pane to another. Other components such as `v-tabs`, `v-carousel` and `v-stepper` utilize this component at their core.

usage.desc: Designed to easily cycle through content, `v-window` provides a simple interface to create truly custom implementations.

onboarding.desc: `v-window` makes it easy to create custom components such as a different styled stepper.

vertical.desc: `v-window` can be vertical. Vertical windows have Y axis transition instead of X axis transition.

account.desc: Create rich forms with smooth animations. `v-window` automatically tracks the current selection index to automatically change the transition direction. This can be manually controlled with the `reverse` prop.

props.continuous: If `true`, window will "wrap around" from the last item to the first, and from the first item to the last
props.nextIcon: Icon used for the "next" button if `show-arrows` is `true`
props.prevIcon: Icon used for the "prev" button if `show-arrows` is `true`
props.reverse: Manually set the window to use the **reverseTransition**
props.showArrowsOnHover: Display the "next" and "prev" buttons on hover. `show-arrows` MUST ALSO be set.
props.touch: Provide a custom **left** and **right** function when swiped left or right
props.vertical: Uses a vertical transition when changing windows

v-window-item.disabled: Prevents the item from becoming active when using the "next" and "prev" buttons or the `toggle` method
